thread.title: Charlotte Motor Speedway, Talladega are going pink
thread.title_full: Charlotte Motor Speedway, Talladega are going pink

title: Charlotte Motor Speedway, Talladega are going pink
text:
Shake and Bake NASCAR Blog Charlotte Motor Speedway, Talladega are going pink Mia Hamm, drivers joined more than 150 cancer survivors for a good cause By Josh Richter - Shake and Bake Crew Sep 30, 2015 at 4:00p ET 0Shares 
To help promote Breast Cancer Awareness Month, Charlotte Motor Speedway's pit road wall is once again going pink. 
Austin Dillon , Miss Sprint Cup and women's soccer legend Mia Hamm were among those who picked up a paint brush for a good cause. Check out some pictures from the day. Over 150 breast cancer survivors, caregivers, friends and family are here to help paint the pit wall pink #BCBSNC300 pic.twitter.com/MhbLgjcGmG
